mapper.select: select RESERVE_IDX, RESERVE_CONFIRM, RESERVE_ID, RESERVE_DATE, CULTURE_NAME, CULTURE_LOCATION, SEAT_NAME, SEAT_PRICE from (select * from RESERVATION inner join CULTURE on RESERVATION.RESERVE_CIDX = CULTURE.CULTURE_IDX inner join SEAT on RESERVATION.RESERVE_SIDX = SEAT.SEAT_IDX ORDER BY RESERVE_IDX DESC) where reserve_id = #{RESERVE_ID} and culture_idx = #{CULTURE_IDX}
mapper.update: update from culture set culture_qrcode = #{CULTURE_QRCODE} where culture_idx = #{CULTURE_IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT MUSIC_ALBUM, MUSIC_SONG, MUSIC_ARTIST, MUSIC_RELEASE, MUSIC_INDEX, MUSIC_ALBUMINFO, MUSIC_ARTISTINFO, MUSIC_GENRE, MUSIC_ORGNAME, MUSIC_SAVNAME FROM MUSIC WHERE MUSIC_INDEX IN (SELECT MUSIC_INDEX FROM EVALUATION WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}) ORDER BY MUSIC_INDEX DESC
